synopsis.text:
High school drama and budding romance take center stage in Tokimeki Memorial, set in the vibrant backdrop of Kirameki High School. As the third and final year commences, the focus is drawn to Shiori Fujisaki, a young girl grappling with her own emotions amidst a sea of twelve fellow students.

A twist of fate brings Shiori in contact with a mysterious girl who accidentally dials her number. While the caller harbors clear feelings, she lacks the courage to confess them, prompting Shiori to encourage her. Over time, the pair cultivates a unique bond, becoming phone friends and confidantes.

Meanwhile, Shiori's own romantic journey remains uncharted as she hesitates to express her feelings. Her supportive circle of friends, each with their own athletic pursuits and romantic queries, rally behind her, encouraging her to take a leap of faith.

Tokimeki Memorial captures the thrill and uncertainty of adolescent love, offering a heartwarming narrative filled with relatable characters and their shared experiences of self-discovery and emotional growth.
